line.text: %WONG%: Ah, you have the Eye of the Shadow Queen. Thank you, my friend.
%WONG%: I apologize that the Orb of Teleportation sent you to Murderworld. I should have foreseen Baron Mordo's treachery.

response.text: %PLAYER%: It's not your fault, Wong. Besides, that little side trip worked to our advantage.

line.text: %WONG%: Perhaps. I find that I must ask a favor of you.
%WONG%: While you are in Mephisto's Realm, if you should locate the Eye of the Shadow Queen, would you bring it to me?
%WONG%: What may I do for you?

response.text: Will the Teleportation Orb work correctly now?

line.text: %WONG%: Rest assured that the Orb will now take you to the proper destination.

response.text: %PLAYER%: What did you have to do to fix it?

line.text: %WONG%: The spells required to counteract Baron Mordo's magic were quite difficult. I found it to be an intriguing test of my skills.

response.text: What was the evil that Clea sensed near the Sanctum Sanctorum?

line.text: %WONG%: That was the spell Baron Mordo had cast to disrupt the Orb of Teleportation. It was designed to activate immediately after anyone used the Orb.

response.text: %PLAYER%: Oh, so that's why we teleported to Murderworld rather than Doom's castle?

line.text: %WONG%: Correct. It is a testament to Mordo's skill that he was able to cloak the spells true function from Clea and Dr. Strange.

response.text: What is the Eye of the Shadow Queen?

line.text: %WONG%: It is a talisman of value to no one but me. The bauble serves as a reminder of a creature who caused me a great deal of turmoil.

response.text: %PLAYER%: What did the Shadow Queen do?

line.text: %WONG%: She had me abducted and taken to her dimension. It required the combined might of Dr. Strange and myself to destroy her.
%WONG%: It is a pleasure to be of service.
